divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside on the phone. One flew over and I just thought it must be a plane with strange bright lights, then there were three in a row, way too close for airplanes. One slowed and the second caught up to it then they all disappeared. I was thinking those look like UFO's when my roommate drove up yelling, " did you see them" She said she saw the lights as red and a dome top I was mostly trying to deny what I was seeing
Summary: There was one separate, then 3 in a line evenly spaced, my roommate saw them as well as she was driving home, I just saw the lights, she saw the dome
